text: Creed is a 2015 American sports drama movie directed by Ryan Coogler and starring Michael B. Jordan, Sylvester Stallone, Tessa Thompson, Phylicia Rashad, Tony Bellew. It is both a sequel and spin-off to the Rocky franchise, which is the seventh movie of the series and a sequel to the 2006 movie Rocky Balboa. The movie was distributed by Warner Bros.. It won 1 Golden Globe and was nominated for an Academy Award in 2016. In 2018 and 2023, two sequels were released, Creed II, Creed III == Other websites == * * * * * * Category:2010s sports movies Category:2015 drama movies Category:2010s sequel movies Category:Rocky movies Category:American sequel movies Category:Movie spin-offs Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies composed by Ludwig GÃ¶ransson
title: Creed (movie)
